name: The Chronicles of Hercules: The 12 Labours
name_original: The Chronicles of Hercules: The 12 Labours
description:
In this epic match3 game. you join Hercules, one of the most famous heroes of mythology, the demi-god son of Zeus. With Iolaus' help you have to solve 12 tasks and slay unstoppable beasts, to gain a place on Olympus. Can Hercules overcome his labours and take his place among the gods?

- A new story of the great hero Hercules
- Fun match-3 puzzles to follow Hercules on his adventures
- Twenty interesting upgrades to unlock
- Adventurous five-chapter story
- Heroes, beasts, and the familiar faces from Greek mythology
